00012 #include <Qt>
00013 #include <QLabel>
00014 #include <QPixmap>
00015 #include <QPushButton>
00016 #include <QDialogButtonBox>
00017 #include <QGridLayout>
00018 
00019 #include "stkpopup.h"
00020 
00021 StkPopup::StkPopup(const QPixmap & pixmap, const QString & text, QWidget *parent) :
00022     StkWidget(parent)
00023 {
00024     // create widgets
00025     // main icon
00026     mIcon = new QLabel(this);
00027     mIcon->setPixmap(pixmap);
00028     // main text message
00029     mText = new QLabel(text, this);
00030     // end session button
00031     mEndButton = new QPushButton("End",this);
00032     // back button
00033     mBackButton = new QPushButton("Back",this);
00034     // ok button box
00035     mOkBox = new QDialogButtonBox(QDialogButtonBox::Ok,Qt::Horizontal,this);
00036 
00037     // layout widgets
00038     // grid layout 3x2
00039     QGridLayout *grid = new QGridLayout(this);
00040     // main icon topleft
00041     grid->addWidget(mIcon,0,0,Qt::AlignLeft);
00042     // end session button topright
00043     grid->addWidget(mEndButton,0,1,Qt::AlignRight|Qt::AlignTop);
00044     // main text message middle left
00045     grid->addWidget(mText,1,0,1,2,Qt::AlignHCenter);
00046     // ok button box bottom left
00047     grid->addWidget(mOkBox,2,0,Qt::AlignHCenter);
00048     // back button bottom right
00049     grid->addWidget(mBackButton,2,1,Qt::AlignRight);
00050 
00051     // connect signals
00052     connect(mEndButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SIGNAL(endSession()));
00053     connect(mBackButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SIGNAL(goBack()));
00054     connect(mOkBox, SIGNAL(accepted()), this, SIGNAL(accepted()));
00055 }
00056 
00057 StkPopup::~StkPopup()
00058 {
00059     close();
00060     delete mText;
00061     delete mIcon;
00062     delete mEndButton;
00063     delete mBackButton;
00064     delete mOkBox;
00065 }
